name: Mother Base
description:
An alien mother base has broken down while passing near the Earth. In order to repair it, you have to connect Earth to the mother base by building an alien tower. Unfortunately, evil humans don't share your grief and will try to destroy the alien structure by shooting their missiles. So you have to repair it fast if you want to succeed.

Controls

Left click an existing joint to select it.

Left click the second exisitng joint to build a strut between the two.

Left click on empty space to create a new joint and build a strut between the two.

Right  click to deselect selected joint.

Right click an existing joint to destroy it.

Space to pause the game.

Connect the Earth to the mother base to win the game!

Credits

Oleg Kalinkin - art, amazing mother base animation, idea generation

Momoka Murata - art, awesome level design and UI

Henri Viies (aka CIRCADE) - sound effects, soundtrack

Mykola Herasymovych - programming, putting all the pieces together

All artwork and sound effects were created during the Global Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours. Soundtrack was created earlier by Henri Viies (aka CIRCADE).
